analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BigbomCrowdSale.checkMaxCap (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#740-753):
	External calls:
	- result = contributorMaxCap(contributor,amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#747-749)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participated (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#749-750)

Reentrancy in BigbomCrowdSale.erc20Buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#857-885):
	External calls:
	- mincap = contributorMinCap(recipient) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#864)
	- maxcap = checkMaxCap(recipient,ethAmount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#865-868)
	- assert(bool)(token.transfer(recipient,recievedTokens)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- depositTxMap (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol)

BigbomToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#248) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#9-10)

BigbomToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#523-525) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#524)

BigbomCrowdSale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#816-823) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#820-823)

BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#556-558)

Reentrancy in BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#553-563):
	External calls:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#556-558)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#560-561)
	- frozenAccount (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#560-561)
	- frozenTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#560-561)
	- maxAllowedAmount (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#560-561)

Reentrancy in BigbomCrowdSale.buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#759-809):
	External calls:
	- mincap = contributorMinCap(recipient) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#769-770)
	- maxcap = checkMaxCap(recipient,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#770-771)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(maxcap)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#788-790)
	- sendETHToMultiSig(allowValue) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#793-794)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#794-796)

Reentrancy in BigbomCrowdSale.erc20Buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#857-885):
	External calls:
	- mincap = contributorMinCap(recipient) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#864)
	- maxcap = checkMaxCap(recipient,ethAmount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol#865-868)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/5/0x8dfe835184c0a53889fa298fd97dca99244d39bc.sol)
